metadata.description: Prepare for 1001 nights of grand, Grimm adventure in the wilds of folkore, steampunk style! Rapunzel's rescuer needs no lengthy locks with his trusty steam-jet to launch him. Red Riding Hood can battle the beasts of the woods with her electrostatic blunderbuss. Ali Baba eludes the pursuing thieves aboard his personal autogyro (carpeted, of course). Snow White teams up with the honeybadgers to dethrone the wicked queen and her mechanized guard! All this and more await you, if you dare!
metadata.name: Steampunk Fairy Tales
